headline: 3 Communication Stocks Set to Ride on Healthy Fiber & Cloud Traction
summary: Increased fiber densification, cloud focus and accelerated pace of 5G deployment should help the Zacks Communication - Components industry thrive despite short-term headwinds. ANET, GLW and AUDC are well-positioned to make the most of the demand for seamless connectivity solutions.

raw.headline: 3 Communication Stocks Set to Ride on Healthy Fiber & Cloud Traction
